quiz.question: Which early behaviorist published influential research on conditioned fear reduction?
Which evidence-based technique uses hierarchical steps of feared stimuli during exposure?
Which phobia concerns fear of development or loss associated with aging?
Which phobia involves fear of clowns and has notable cultural representation in media?
Which phobia involves fear of being judged or embarrassed socially?
Which historical therapy used gradual pairing of feared animal with positive experiences to reduce fear?
Which phobia often appears in childhood and can persist into adulthood?
Which rare phobia describes fear of crossing or walking under bridges specifically?
Which phobia refers to fear of dogs?
Which phobia commonly appears as a fear of needles during medical procedures?
Which rare phobia describes fear of the number thirteen specifically?
